original_text: Christ's death on a cross may seem a silly thing for God to do. But really it shows that God is very wise. He is wiser than people with their clever ideas. Christ's death on a cross may seem to show that God is weak. But really he is stronger than any human power. Christ's death on a cross may seem a silly thing for God to do. But really it shows that God is very wise. He is wiser than people with their clever ideas. Christ's death on a cross may seem to show that God is weak. But really he is stronger than any human power.
korean_text: 하나님의 어리석음이 사람보다 지혜롭고 하나님의 약하심이 사람보다 강하니라

sentences.original_text: Christ's death on a cross may seem a silly thing
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도의 십자가 죽음은 어리석은 것처럼 보일 수 있다

sentences.original_text: Christ's death on a cross may seem to show
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도의 십자가 죽음은 보여주는 것처럼 보일 수 있다
